div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://smart.who.int/ips-pilgrimage/CodeSystem/IPS.HAJJ defines the following codes:

tr.td: Consent for Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
<INSERT TEXT FROM KSA: discuss pilgrim's consent to share their IPS during provision of clinical care during the Hajj event as well as any follow-up care that may be needed.>
<INSERT TEXT FROM INDONESIA: discuss pilgrims's consent to utilize Satusehat to enable access to KSA to their IPS if they are in need of care during Hajj>
<INSERT TEXT FROM MALAYSIA: discuss pilgrims's consent to utilize MySejahtera to enable access to KSA to their IPS if they are in need of care during Hajj>
<INSERT TEXT FROM OMAN: discuss pilgrims's consent to utilize Oman's e-Health Portal to enable access to KSA to their IPS if they are in need of care>

description.value: CodeSystem for IPS.HAJJ CodeSystem for utilization of IPS during Hajj

display.value: Consent for Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
